meanings.definition: Inflammation of the mucous membrane of the nose.
meanings.sent1: Rhinitis can make your nose feel stuffy and uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: She visited the doctor for treatment of her rhinitis.
meanings.sent3: The rhinitis in his nose seemed to have a mind of its own, causing him to sneeze at unexpected times.
meanings.sent4: Her rhinitis was like a persistent guest, never wanting to leave her nose.
meanings.sent5: The rhinitis was a red flag, signaling the start of allergy season.

meanings.definition: A condition characterized by sneezing, nasal discharge, and congestion.
meanings.sent1: His rhinitis always acted up during pollen season.
meanings.sent2: The child's rhinitis made it hard for her to breathe through her nose.
meanings.sent3: The rhinitis seemed to have a party in his nose, inviting sneezing and congestion to join.
meanings.sent4: The rhinitis was a traffic jam in his nose, causing chaos and discomfort.
meanings.sent5: Dealing with rhinitis felt like trying to swim through a sea of tissues.
